overview: Life seems to eat us and leaves us no margin to decide… but what would happen if that person, that blow of destiny or that stop had a sense that you did not expect and changed your look and the focus of your life? These are four real stories that came face to face with someone that many cannot see… although Jaime, Carlos, Andrea, Antonio and Sonsoles assure that he is ALIVE and has brought them back to life. If you listen you can hear Him and, if you look, you can see Him, because, although it is hard to believe: There is life.
title: ALIVE: WHO IS THERE?
